mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_CAR WHERE CAR_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT CAR_ID carId , CAR_NAME carName , CAR_CONTENT carContent , CAR_SEET carSeet , CAR_SIZE carSize , BATTERY battery , CAR_IMAGE carImage , CAR_STATUS carStatus , CAR_DRIVING carDriving , CAR_EFFICIENCY carEfficiency FROM TB_CAR C WHERE C.CAR_STATUS = 'Y' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TB_RESERVATION R WHERE R.CAR_ID = C.CAR_ID AND R.RESERVATION_STATUS = 'Y' ) ORDER BY CAR_ID ASC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY

SELECT CAR_ID carId , CAR_NAME carName , CAR_CONTENT carContent , CAR_SEET carSeet , CAR_SIZE carSize , BATTERY battery , CAR_IMAGE carImage , CAR_STATUS carStatus , CAR_DRIVING carDriving , CAR_EFFICIENCY carEfficiency FROM TB_CAR WHERE CAR_ID = #{carId}

SELECT RESERVATION_NO reservationNo , USER_NO userNo , CAR_ID carId , RESERVATION_DATE reservationDate , START_TIME startTime , END_TIME endTime , DESTINATION destination , RESERVATION_STATUS reservationStatus , RETURN_STATUS returnStatus FROM TB_RESERVATION WHERE RESERVATION_NO = #{reservationNo} AND RESERVATION_STATUS = 'Y' AND RETURN_STATUS = 'N'
